page.title: 12Camden Lock And The Canal
page.content: Down by the Canal there is a sort of street market. There's lots of stalls and peoples crafts. You can buy lots and lots of different things. On stalls there are antiques as well as new things so whatever your taste you're bound to find it there. There's also lots of different tapes and records. There's actors and live music shows and puppet shows as well! In short There's everything. It's really brilliant!!! It's quite big and you can spend a whole day there. You can also get food there it's usually bigger and better at the weekends it's also buisier then. You can get water bus rides there to the zoo to see all the animals or to little Venice. You can also see a play ohe water busses or you can eat on them. The canal has a great and long history and is called the Regents Canal.
